meanings.definition: A leather strap or metal spring used to support a wagon or carriage.
meanings.sent1: The thoroughbrace snapped, causing the wagon to tilt.
meanings.sent2: The wagon driver checked the thoroughbrace before setting off on the journey.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the thoroughbrace as a swing in the forest.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was the thoroughbrace that held her dreams together.
meanings.sent5: The worn-out thoroughbrace creaked under the weight of the heavy load.
